title: Invention No. 1 in C Major, BWV 772

musicalLanguage.description: Bach's Two-Part Invention No. 1 in C Major is one of the most important pedagogical works in the piano repertoire. The right hand states the subject, and the left hand answers in imitation. This simplified excerpt captures the opening subject and answer.
keyMoments: Subject statement in right hand, measure 1
Imitative answer in left hand, measure 3
teachingGoals: Understand imitative counterpoint between two voices
Develop hand independence with two melodic lines
styleTips: Each hand should sound like an independent singer
Keep articulation light and clear — no pedal
